subject: Discovery call with John Smith
description: Discussed current challenges with their CRM system and potential solutions. Very interested in enterprise features.

subject: Proposal sent to Sarah Johnson
description: Sent detailed proposal for marketing automation platform including pricing and implementation timeline.

subject: Technical demo for DataWorks team
description: Conducted comprehensive product demo focusing on analytics capabilities. Great engagement from technical team.

subject: Follow-up required for Emily Davis
description: Emily mentioned budget approval process takes 2-3 weeks. Schedule follow-up call for early February.

subject: Security discussion with David Wilson
description: Addressed compliance requirements and security protocols. Provided additional documentation as requested.

subject: Contract signing with Lisa Anderson
description: Final contract review and signature. Deal officially closed. Implementation planning meeting scheduled for next week.

subject: Technical requirements from Robert Taylor
description: Received detailed technical requirements document. Reviewing with engineering team for feasibility assessment.

subject: Prepare integration timeline for Jennifer
description: Need to create detailed project timeline for product integration services. Include milestones and deliverables.

subject: Pricing negotiation with William Garcia
description: Discussed pricing options and payment terms. Reached agreement on phased implementation approach.

subject: Lost deal - Amanda Rodriguez feedback
description: Amanda provided feedback on why they chose competitor. Price was main factor. Document lessons learned for future opportunities.

subject: Welcome email to new prospects
description: Sent introduction email to new leads from marketing campaign. Included company overview and scheduling link.

subject: Quarterly business review preparation
description: Preparing presentation for upcoming QBR with key accounts. Focus on expansion opportunities and renewals.
